text: Mai di na ren he tamen sizhou de youmu de alabo ren, bu gai douliu zai houfang, er busui shizhe chuzheng; bu gai zhigu ziji de anyi, er bu yu shizhe gong huannan. Yinwei fan tamen wei an la er zaoyu de ji ke he laodun, tamen chunu buxindao zhe de mei yi bufa, huo mei ci dui diren you suo shouhuo, mei you yi jian jiu bi wei tamen ji yi gong, an la yiding bu shi xingshan zhe tulao wu chou
